name: Bossy Bird
description:
As a mid-level manager in a mega corporation, your job is to fly like a hawk towards your employees and convince them to work harder. But watch out for those broken pillars! Was there an earthquake? Probably! It really doesn’t matter!

HOW TO PLAY
Tap the screen to flap your wings.
Fly through as many pillars as possible.
Compete with your friends on Game Center!

Good luck!
